斸斸斸

斸字的基本解释

斸
zhú
大锄：“恶金以铸鉏（锄）、夷、斤、斸，试诸壤土。”
挖：“其下常斸掘，种绿豆、小豆。”
砍：“谁将修月斧，斸取一尖来。”

斸字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhú］
［《廣韻》陟五切，入燭，知。］
亦作“劚1”。
(1)锄头。
(2)掘。
(3)斫，砍削。
(4)刺。

斸字的康熙字典解释

【卯集下】【斤字部】　斸； 康熙笔画：25； 页码：页481第02
【唐韻】陟玉切【集韻】【韻會】株玉切，?音瘃。【說文】斫也。【爾雅·釋器】斪斸謂之定。互詳斪字註。【玉篇】同钃。　又【五音集韻】之角切，音琢。義同。

斸字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体旧字形
斸字的起名意思

暂无。

Shao
Basic explanation of words
Shao
zhú
Big hoe: "Evil gold is used to cast iron (hoe), barbarians, catties, and glutinous soil, and try all kinds of loam."
Digging: "It is often digging under it, planting mung beans and adzuki beans."
Chop: "Who will repair the moon axe, pick a tip."
Shao
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhú］
["Guangyun" has five cuts, enters the candle, knows. ]
Also known as "劚1".
(1) Hoes.
(2) Digging.
(3) Tuck, chop and cut.
(4) Thorns.
Shao
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Jixia] [Jin Zi Department] 　斸; Kangxi Strokes: 25; Page Number: Page 481 02
[Tang Yun] Zhiyu cut [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Zhuyu cut,? Yin 瘃. [Said the text] Ye Ye. 【Erya·Release Device】We say that it is fixed. Note each other in detail. 【Jade articles】Same as 钃.　The corners of [Pentagram Rhyme] are cut, and the sound is cut. The same meaning.
Shao
